name: Int-Labs
description:
entrepreneurs, passionate about innovation
 We have had our own skin in the game since our first startups, and have figured out what works, and what does not. We also strongly believe that the majority of world changing innovations actually happen at corporations, rather than startups. We are passionate about unlocking the innovative potential of those who are crazy enough to try. We are a boutique innovation agency founded by active entrepreneurs and startup founders. Our vision at Int Labs is to empower people to imagine, and build innovative solutions for the world. We understand innovation.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Building innovative products, leaders, and organisations
ShortDescription: Int Labs is to empower people to imagine, and build innovative solutions for the world.

Highlights.name: Boutique consulting, not volume consulting
Highlights.description: Our smaller size allows us to be more efficient, and agile. We will give you a better solution faster, with a higher ROI.

Highlights.name: We are obsessed with creating impact
Highlights.description: When innovation is impact-driven, it has the ability to change the world. We don't just talk about theory, but focus on real life problems-to-be-solved

Highlights.name: We are entrepreneurs, who live innovation
Highlights.description: We understand the innovation that actually works, because we have used it in our own start-ups

enhanced_description: Int-Labs is a boutique innovation agency founded by active entrepreneurs and startup founders. Their core vision is to empower individuals within corporations to imagine and build innovative solutions. They specialize in unlocking the innovative potential of organizations, focusing on building innovative products, leaders, and organizations. Their approach emphasizes practical, real-world innovation, drawing from their founders' extensive experience in building startups and understanding what truly works in innovation.
key_use_cases: Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency in innovation
Empowering employees to imagine and build innovative solutions
competitive_advantages: Boutique and agile consulting approach, leading to more efficient, faster solutions and higher ROI
Founders are active entrepreneurs with first-hand experience in building and scaling startups, ensuring practical and proven innovation strategies
Obsession with creating impact, focusing on real-life problems-to-be-solved rather than just theory
Deep understanding of innovation that actually works, validated through personal startup experiences
implementation_scenarios: Custom innovation program development and deployment
roi_benefits: Higher return on investment for innovation initiatives
